scripts.plan: cd target/main.tfaws && terraform init && terraform plan -input=false
scripts.deploy: cd target/main.tfaws && terraform init && terraform apply -auto-approve -input=false
scripts.redirect:plan: cd target/redirect.tfaws && terraform init && terraform plan -input=false
scripts.redirect:deploy: cd target/redirect.tfaws && terraform init && terraform apply -auto-approve -input=false
